title: Meet You There
lyrics:
Now you're gone,
I wonder why,
You left me here,
I think about it on,
and on, and on, and on,
and on, and on again.

I know you're never coming back,

I hope that you can hear me,

I'm waiting to hear from you..

Until i do,

You're gone away,

I'm left alone,

A part of me is gone,

And I'm not moving on,

So wait for me,

I know the day will come..

I'll meet you there,

No matter where life takes me to,

I'll meet you there,

And even if I need you here,

I'll meet you there.

I wish I could have told you,

The things I kept inside,

But now I guess its just too late.

So many things remind me of you,

I hope that you can hear me,

I miss you,

This is goodbye,

One last time..

You're gone away,

I'm left alone,

A part of me is gone,

And I'm not moving on,

So wait for me,

I know the day will come..

I'll meet you there,

No matter where life takes me to,

I'll meet you there,

And even if I need you here,

I'll meet you there,

No matter where life takes me to,

I'll meet you there,

And even if I need you here,

I'll meet you there.

I'll meet you there....

And where I go you'll be there with me,

Forever you'll be right here with me..

I'll meet you there,

No matter where life takes me to,

I'll meet you there,

And even if I need you here,

I'll meet you there,

No matter where life takes me..

I'll meet you there,

And even if I need you..

I'll meet you there...

I'll meet you there...

I'll meet you there..
